=== Syracuse Meetup for March 2008 ===
Grab a slice of pizza and enjoy a conversation about Linux and Ubuntu. Get to know other Ubuntu users and supporters in the greater Syracuse area. 

 WHERE: Pizza Hut 3137 Erie Boulevard East, Syracuse, NY 13214

 WHEN: Saturday March 22nd, 7:30 pm -
 
 CONTACT:  
Be sure to bring your PGP key fingerprints for a mini key signing party!
